name: Tiny Toon Adventures - Carrot Land
description:
Plucky Duck is in search of the treasure of Carrot Land. Babs Bunny will make sure he doesn't get into serious trouble, and take some carrots in the way

Keyboard controls:

-Arrow keys as the Gameboy's D-Pad (moving Babs left or right)

-Z as B button (jumping and advancing through cutscenes)

-Q or Enter as Start button (check carrots and lives during gameplay)

Controls:

Use the D-pad to move Babs, and the B button to make her jump and advance through cutscenes. She can take different carrot powerups to change her physics, includin carrot cake (to get heavier) and balloon carrot (to get lighter and jump higher)

 The game has an unfinished feel, but I can't promise or guarantee updates (but maybe and hopefully there will be)

 You can download the rom to play on emulator or Gameboy hardware here: https://payhip.com/b/aJiY

 Made with GB Studio 2 beta 5, by Chris Maltby
